Name: Love Rhythm
About the game: About this Game Behind the hustle and bustle of Seoul City lies many unqiue stories. It’s revolving love, ambition and even hatred and crime. Let’s follow four piece of little stories which has destined to let you meetup with 3 gourgeous ladies. Be with them when they need you the most and follow the love rhythm to reach their deepest soul. Features: Classic casual rhythm game mechanics. 16 main-story songs with vocals and breathtaking beats. Story with decision making which affect the girls’ impression on you. English voice-over, gift shop, clothes system and many more. Disclaimer: All characters are over 18 years old.
